get.description: To get the license details of the given Desk portal

post.description: This API cancel the trial license plan in your help desk.

This API marks the banner as closed for the current user until the following third day within the grace period. After the plan is canceled, the API permanently marks the banner as closed for the current user.
This API enable other license trail plans in your help desk.

get.description: To get the license trial plans details in your help desk
